# golfR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/datagolf)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=datagolf)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/tayharris/golfr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tayharris/golfr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of golfR package is to create a set of functions useful in analyzing pro golf tournaments using strokes gained data and interacting with the datagolf.com api.
